review: The Doctor is very nice and his prescription's are on point. I'm happy that I visited him for my toothache problem.

*** ****** ** ********* ** *** ********* *** **** He is very good and professional at his job but is not open to suggestions / modifications. He will entertain every one of your requests and appointments as long as you ask for it twice or thrice. Very ************* *** experienced but you need to deal with the person's behavior as well. ** *** **** *** **** *** **** ****** **** *** **** ** ***** ***
Way too overpriced, I went to the doctor bcoz my braces wire was poking. just for cutting a small piece of wire they charged a good amount. Not recommended for small dental things.
I had a very small composite removed from my tooth which needed to be filled again. It cost me a lot.
Consultation was good . Thanks to the doctor for quick finding about the issue and remedy . Hoping to have a speedy recovery .
Excellent experience. **** ************* ****** and very efficient. He explained the issue in detail.
The people of all care dental very friendly and caring and the PPL r showing great hospitality.Beautiful relaxed environment no tension with respect to treatment and great doctors and always positive

* ****** **** ******* He explained very clearly what the issue was and the resolution too was superfast. I would recommend him definitely. Just that I would give him 4 stars our of 5 because he didn't care to inform beforehand that an x-ray and scaling was required as it has additional costs. He went ahead without caring to ask for a consent.But it's ok because the resolution to my problem was anyways long due.
